org.apache.spark.sql.columnar

Interface ColumnBuilder

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CompressibleColumnBuilder<T>, NullableColumnBuilder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicColumnBuilder, BinaryColumnBuilder, BooleanColumnBuilder, ByteColumnBuilder, ComplexColumnBuilder, DateColumnBuilder, DoubleColumnBuilder, FixedDecimalColumnBuilder, FloatColumnBuilder, GenericColumnBuilder, IntColumnBuilder, LongColumnBuilder, NativeColumnBuilder, ShortColumnBuilder, StringColumnBuilder, TimestampColumnBuilder

    public interface ColumnBuilder
